content: marker round 1 k1 ssk k1 across to 3 st before m work top of foot stitches in pattern to m sm ktbl 15 k2tog k1 sm k1 ssk k to 3 st before bor m k2tog k 17 19 21 stitches k across heel turn stitches ktbl 15 17 19 21 stitches sm round 2 knit even gusset continue to work round 1 and round 2 until 24 28 32 36 stitches remain break yarn leaving a long tail round 1 work top of foot stitches in established pattern to m sm k1 ssk k across to last 3 stitches graft toe together using kitchener stitch k2tog k1 sm now would be a great time to cast on your round 2 work top of foot stitches in established second sock pattern sm k to bor sm block your socks and enjoy continue working rounds 1 and 2 until bottom of foot stitches have been decreased to 28 32 36 40 stitches you will now have a total of 57 65 73 81 stitches 5 of 6 modifications for shorty or ankle socks- cuff- 8 rounds leg- 3-8 reps of leg pattern heel flap heel turn gusset foot and toe will be worked the same as written above small medium large xlarge j hang out with me on social media i q backwoods knits @backwoodsknits this pattern is for personal use only and is not to be backwoodsknitsco shared or duplicated backwoodsknitsco thank you @backwoodsknits lauren colby 6 of 6
